revised_title: Hector Munro Macdonald's Contributions to Mathematics and Physics
tldr: Hector Munro Macdonald was a prominent mathematician and physicist who made significant contributions to the fields of mathematics, Bessel functions, electrodynamics, elasticity, and theoretical physics. His work included establishing the density of electric charge near the vertex of a cone, solving the torsion problem in elasticity, and developing Macdonald's theorem. Macdonald's research on elastic waves in crystals and his critique of Maxwell's electromagnetic energy function are among his most notable achievements.
